A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This film lacks all seriousness for itself and destroys the integrity for all previous movies before it.

Character assassination\, blatant copy and pasting ideas from the original trilogy and an obvious attempt to push a political message which should not be done on the big screen.

What hurts most is I booked two tickets to see this movie before seeing it!!! What a waste of time and money.
